title: Message to President Rafael Leonidas Trujillo of the Dominican Republic About a Hurricane Disaster.
text:
I AM SHOCKED and grieved to learn of the terrible storm disaster which has wrought such devastation in Santo Domingo and I hasten to send you my own deep sympathy and that of my fellow citizens with your suffering people.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency General Rafael L. Trujillo, President of the Dominican Republic, Santo Domingo]
